Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute near 51st/St. Lawerence
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses temp. rerouted SB: St. Lawerence, 47th, Cottage Gr. and 51st; NB 51st, Champlain. 47th and King Dr.: near 51st/St. Lawerence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 51st/St. Lawerence, due to street blockage near 51st/St. Lawerence.

Southbound buses will operate via  51st, St. Lawrence, 47th and Cottage Grove including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Northbound buses will operate via 51st, Champlain, 47th and King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Wellington
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Wellington due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Wellington due to a door problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
